document_data.name: Ulbrec Dinnesmore
document_data.mainbody:
Lord '''Ulbrec Dinnesmore''' was a man from [[Neverwinter]] who became the lord of [[Targos]] in [[Icewind Dale]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Well, ye'd want to be seeing the lord of this place, Ulbrec's his name. Good enough fella... fer a lord.|[[Hedron Kerdos]]}}
document_data.Personality: Ulbrec was known for his short temper.
document_data.History:
Ulbrec was a Neverwintan guard who met [[Elytharra Dinnesmore|Elytharra]] when he was about 20 years old. They married and, when he retired, the couple moved to Targos, where he took a seat on the ruling council of the [[Ten Towns]]. He received the title "Lord" in the {{YearlinkName|1299}}.

He was lord of Targos through its assault by [[goblin]]s of the [[Legion of the Chimera]] in the {{YearlinkName|1312}}.
